text:
[Verse]
Walking down the sidewalk
City lights so bright
People pass in shadows
Neon signs in sight

[Verse 2]
Buskers play their music
Coins in open hats
Laughter in the alleys
Footsteps quick and fast

[Chorus]
Oh life on the sidewalk
Stories untold
Oh life on the sidewalk
Mysteries unfold

[Verse 3]
Windows show reflections
Dreams behind the glass
Taxi cabs are honking
Time moves way too fast

[Chorus]
Oh life on the sidewalk
Stories untold
Oh life on the sidewalk
Mysteries unfold

[Bridge]
Faces blend and blur
Night turns into day
The city's always moving
But I find my way
title: Life on the Sidewalk
